name: tweezr
description: a library to reverse search values within a JSON structure or a javascript object & generate the dot-notation query selectors in context of the specified object. You may also use it to "walk" through the structure one step at a time to read/write values. Think of it as a XPath generator of a value deep within the JSON structure.
author: Nishant Das Patnaik <nishant.dp@gmail.com> (nishant.daspatnaik.com)
